userEmail.description: The email address of the user. If not provided, uses the default user email from environment

subject.description: The subject/title of the calendar event

description.description: Optional detailed description of the event

startDateTime.description: Start date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2025-11-24T10:00:00Z')

endDateTime.description: Optional end date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2025-11-24T11:00:00Z'). If not provided, defaults to 1 hour after start time

location.description: Optional location of the event (e.g., 'Conference Room A', 'Virtual Meeting')

attendees.description: Optional array of attendee email addresses
